tweet: No question about it, #MichaelCohen is a liar. It’s embarrassing that @HouseDemocrats had us sit through this circus. Meanwhile, @realDonaldTrump is in Vietnam addressing real issues. https://twitter.com/GOPoversight/status/1100870603148414976 …

Our Second Amendment rights are at stake. @HouseDemocrats want to rob us of our constitutionally guaranteed protections in the name of violence prevention, all while doing nothing to actually prevent violence.
As written now, the current House gun control proposal would have done nothing to prevent many of the tragedies with firearms we’ve witnessed in recent years. #Support2A
Requiring additional background checks does nothing if the check isn’t run against a complete database—let’s focus on implementation of current laws like #FixNICS before creating new ones. #Support2A

The current gun control legislation before the House will criminalize the private transfer of firearms, including to some family members, prohibiting Americans from exercising their right to self-defense. #Support2A

Hey @HouseDemocrats—how about instead of creating new laws, we better apply the ones we already have on the books? What’s the value of a background check without quality and accurate data in the system? #FixNICS #Support2A

(2/2) 1. Require failed background checks to be reported to law enforcement.
2. Require illegal immigrants be reported to ICE if they attempted to purchase a firearm. #Support2A pic.twitter.com/mbKCqMXBL6

(1/2) Just got off the House Floor discussing the Democrats’ gun control legislation, H.R. 8. This bill is nothing more than a political stunt. If Democrats cared about solving problems, they would have supported my amendment that would do two things: pic.twitter.com/wWEbL58nZf
Don’t be fooled: House Dems claim their gun control bill is a solution to gun violence, but it does nothing to solve real problems like our nation’s mental health crisis. #Support2A
Democrats don't want to stop gun violence, they want to infringe on the constitutionally guaranteed Second Amendment rights of law-abiding American citizens. We must stop H.R. 8! #Support2A
H.R. 8 will criminalize the private transfer of firearms and will make exercising basic constitutional rights impossibly expensive for millions of law-abiding Americans. #Support2A
H.R. 8 claims to be a solution to gun violence yet does nothing to solve real problems that contribute to this crisis. #Support2A
